amendment.description: To set aside funds for the Navajo electrification demonstration program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1658 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1658 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S11539, S11544) To set aside funds for the Navajo electrification demonstration program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1658 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1658 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bingaman.
